resources.string: Choose from list below to view the timeline. Press refresh to update the list from the server.
Choose from list below to view the timeline or manage your subscriptions to that list.
You're currently not subscribed to any list. Find a list you want to subscribe to by browsing thru other peoples profiles.
You need to quit Twidroyd and open it again for changes to take effect.
Enter a list name below and press create list. The list name must not contain any special characters or spaces.
The list name must not contain any special characters or spaces.
Check the lists where you want to add this user as a member.
Select with which accounts you want to subscribe to
Multi-Account support is only available in Twidroyd PRO. Please check out your application store to buy a copy today.
Managing Lists is only available in Twidroyd PRO. Please check out your application store to buy a copy today.
View List Members is only available in Twidroyd PRO. Please check out your application store to buy a copy today.
View List Followers is only available in Twidroyd PRO. Please check out your application store to buy a copy today.
List of followers is only available in Twidroyd PRO. Please check out your application store to buy a copy today.
List of friends is only available in Twidroyd PRO. Please check out your application store to buy a copy today.
Do you want to follow @twidroyd on Twitter?
Please accept the EULA to use Twidroyd
This user has protected his/her timeline. You need be in his/her followers list to view it.
Unknown Location - Setting Profile Location to:
Waiting for GPS fix. Make sure the sky is visible
No GPS or GPS signal weak
Make sure your phone has a clear view of the sky and there are no nearby natural or man-made obstacles such as dense tree-cover or a really large building.
Profile Image Updated. It can take a few minutes, until the profile image appears in Twidroyd.
Automatic URL shortening is disabled in Twidroyd. Please choose one of the available services within Twidroyd's settings
A new version of Twidroyd is available in the Android Market.
Would you like to delete your credentials before exiting the application?
Connection failed. Please try again later.
Connection timed out. Please try again.
The url shortening service is currently not available.
The GeoNames server is currently unavailable.
You may not delete another user's status.
No location service available. Please enable GPS or coarse location.
Authentication failed. Please re-enter your login information in the account settings.
Twitter is over capacity. Too many tweets! Please wait a moment and try again.
Twitter is over capacity. Too many tweets!. If the problem persists please see http://status.twitter.com.
Cannot access SD card. Please check if your SD card is correctly mounted and there is some space left.
Cannot determine your location. Please enable GPS or coarse location.

Twitter Rate Limit reached. Twitter sets a limit on how many times it can be used in an hour. There have been more than your allowed maximum requests in the last hour. This could be due to having multiple Twitter applications running with the same account. Do you have another client running with the same Twitter account? Please wait a few minutes before trying again and make sure your other clients are off.
This version of Twidroyd has been expired. Please download the latest version from the Android market.
The username contains an @ sign. Please use your TwitterId instead of your email-address.
Could not authenticate you. Maybe your login information is incorrect or your account is locked after too many failed attempts to sign in. Please chillax for a few, then try again.
Can't send message to this user. Is
The Twidroyd service has started running
The Twidroyd service has finished running
Unknown Recipient or not a Follower
Twidroyd not set-up properly. Please start Twidroyd and enter your Twitter account info
Enabling drains battery and requires permanent internet connection.
Longer update intervals save your battery. (*=battery-efficient intervals)
Quick launch Twidroyd via permanent status icon
Number of tweets shown in your timeline
Show real names instead of Twitter usernames
Moves it to the home menu to save space
Moves it to the home menu to save space
Choose a quality according to your connection speed
Annotate your tweets and photos with location information
Either show merged view or default account when opening a tab.
You can use swipe from left to right to switch accounts instead.
Shake your phone to trigger an update
Autocomplete for direct message recipients and @replies
Avoid accidentally sending when pressing the enter button
Disables loading of profile images to improve speed.
Use SDCard to store application data
Clear Tweet history and cached avatars
Automatically send bug traces on errors
Send anonymous crash reports to improve Twidroyd
The specified Tweet was not found.
No Tweet-Id passed to this view
Remembers your scroll position in the timeline
There was an error creating your search: Saved search may already exist.
Sorry, you are not authorized to see this status.
Use fast and simple browser inside Twidroyd
Show a separate notification for each Tweet
License was already activated for another device
Invalid License. Please contact the Twidroyd support team and email your order details
Please restart Twidroyd by exiting via Exit Application, for changes to take affect.
You can buy Twidroyd PRO either via the Google Android Market, via the Twidroyd.com website or via the AndAppStore.
If you've received a license key via email, please click on the link in that email to activate Twidroyd PRO.
This license key has already been activated for another phone. Please contact the Twidroyd support team and email your order details.
AndAppStore found, but not set-up correctly.
You need to have a Twitter account to use photo/video services.
Anyone can subscribe to this list.
Can not create the video directory on the SD card, because a file with the same name exists. Please remove that file and try it again.
Can not create the data directory on the SD card, because a file with the same name exists. Please remove that file and try it again.
Error while sending your message. You can save it into the outbox and Twidroyd will send it as soon as the connection is available again.
Message was saved into outbox for deferred sending
Check this if you're using very dark themes
Please enter bit.ly username and API key
Your authentication token seems to be expired. Please go to Accounts and re-authorize your Twitter Account
Cannot send the same message twice
Your phone's clock is not accurate. This will cause connection problems. Please make sure to set it correctly.
Your Tweet exceeds 140 characters. Do you want to shorten the Tweet using Twitlonger?

This product contains the following open-source libraries: Apache-Mime4J, OAuth-signpost.
Apache-Mime4J: Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
